section.p: Rottburg (meaning Red Castle) is a suburb of Laibstadt. After the plague decimated the city, and a fire gutted most of the houses in the low lying southern quarter of the suburb, it has come to be known colloquially as Ascheburg (Ash Castle). To the north the suburb is housing for the lower classes, to the south, where the fire damage is, it is inhabited by ne'er do wells, street urchins, beggars, and prostitutes. Because of the number of illegal brothels the suburb is sometimes referred to as Assburg.
